taskbody.context: To add a column to a table, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell near which you want to insert a column.

choices.choice: To insert a column to the left of the cell, choose Table Insert Column Before , or click the Insert Column Before button on the toolbar.
To insert a column to the right of the cell, choose Table Insert Column After .

taskbody.context: To add a row to a table, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell above/below which you want to insert a row.

choices.choice: To insert a row above the cell, choose Table Insert Row Above , or click the Insert Row Above button on the toolbar.
To insert a row below the cell, choose Table Insert Row Below .

taskbody.context: To add a cell to a table, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell near which you want to insert a new cell.

choices.choice: To insert a cell to the left of the cell, choose Table Insert Cell Before .
To insert a cell to the right of the cell, choose Table Insert Cell After .
